title: Is it true that the Guinness Book of World Records is fading away? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends but records are still records and people have same craze about that it is just people have divided their thoughts and industry into parts so they have started focusing on those topic. If you find this answer helpful to you, kindly upvote it and follow me here. (Praveen Sharma (प्रवीण शर्मा (पाराशर))) 😇😇🙏

I remember Record Breakers on TV when I was growing up. Guinness records were all about the fastest, strongest, biggest, greatest. The things achieved were worthy of note, and were to be admired and respected. Now it seems like anyone doing something for the first time can enter the record books.
